snippet.title: Carnivores | #1 | The Hunt Is On!
snippet.description:
Subscribe with this handy dandy link! - http://bit.ly/13OT2RF
And for alternate sources of British Banter, come say hello on Facebook  - http://on.fb.me/17FhW3J
See the rest of Carnivores at this playlist - http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLU0V6ITiWqjiK37lEPB6M9LVbd9PNPgOg&feature=edit_ok

Canivores is a retro hunting game for the PC that pits you against a horde of different dinosaurs in a quest to get as many points as possible! POINTS MEANS PRIZES! ... It doesn't really. Means access to more dinosaurs. Dinosaurs that will eat me. :(

I promise that I do manage to hunt down the Parasaurololololophus eventually. EVENTUALLY. It just takes me 20 minutes. Plus there's a NOPE at the end... you have been forewarned.

PS : I friggin' hate the thumbnail for this game but cannot for the life of me design a better one right now.

------------------------------------------------------

Carnivores is an absolute classic, and you can learn lots more about it over here on this there Wikipedia page type thing - http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carnivores_(series)
"The Carnivores games are a series of hunting simulation video games featuring prehistoric species ranging from dinosaurs to Quaternary mammals (depending on the title). The first three games were developed for the PC by Action Forms and released by WizardWorks Software between 1998 and 2001. The fourth game, Carnivores Cityscape, was developed by Sunstorm Interactive and released by Infogrames in 2002. The fifth game, Carnivores: Dinosaur Hunter, is a port of Carnivores 2 to the iOS by Tatem Games and the PSP by Beatshapers, released in 2010. The series has attracted a small cult following."

Funnily enough for a dinosaur game, people did actually like this one and not slate it during the reviews! Yay for dinosaaurs!
http://www.gamespot.com/carnivores/reviews/carnivores-review-2538321/
http://uk.ign.com/articles/1998/12/31/carnivores
http://www.allgame.com/game.php?id=18379&tab=review

There's also a Carnivores 2 PC game that was since ported over to iOS - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I4XicJjSfMM
